title: SET_ENTITY_VISIBLE
content:
0xEA1C610A04DB6BBB0xD043E8E1// SetEntityVisible
void SET_ENTITY_VISIBLE(Entity entity, BOOL toggle, BOOL unk);Parameters:entity: The entity to change the visibility oftoggle: Whether or not the entity will be visibleunk: Always 0 in scriptsToggle the visibility of a given entity.Examples:LuaSetEntityVisible(PlayerPedId(), false, 0)
codeBlocks:
// SetEntityVisible
void SET_ENTITY_VISIBLE(Entity entity, BOOL toggle, BOOL unk);

local entity = GetEntityCoords(PlayerPedId())
-- Example usage for SET_ENTITY_VISIBLE
SetEntityVisible(entity, true, true)
